name: Astrogeo
description:
This is our studios first project release!

We wanted to opportunity to display our skills, and here we are with Astrogeo!

A short commitment space shooter where your goal is to survive as long as possible!

How long can you go? Only way to find out is to give it a shot!

Credits:
Nikolas De la Cruz @ nikolasdelacruz.com
Badr Akaabi @ https://www.artstation.com/stickybutter
